doc.title: The Message
doc.plot: Joanne, is a successful businessperson, ambitious and full of energy. David, is on a career path that is not so fulfilling. Joanne has exciting news that may change their lives forever, but her excitement quickly fades, as David too has something to say. 'The Message' offers a revealing, intimate and compelling look at the ironic outcome of two lovers caught in the extremities of their respective states of mind.
